member.name: T:MassTransit.WindsorIntegration.MassTransitFacilityBase
member.summary: Facility to simplify the use of MT

member.name: M:MassTransit.WindsorIntegration.MassTransitFacilityBase.RegisterInMemorySubscriptionService
member.summary: Registers the in-memory subscription service so that all buses created in the same process share subscriptions

member.name: M:MassTransit.WindsorIntegration.MassTransitFacilityBase.RegisterBusDependencies
member.summary: Registers the types used by the service bus internally and as part of the container. These are typically items that are not swapped based on the container implementation
